Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
As I expected, this inspection was another waste
of my time. Your common cows are obviously
inferior to my purebred livestock.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Why, they didn't even blink when I, a stranger,
walked right into their barn! Such contented
complacency is not a desirable trait.
<PAGE>
How could one possibly get quality milk from
these placid, grass-munching blobs?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? You object to my analysis based on
pedigree, do you? Hmph. Well, perhaps you
have a point.
<PAGE>
I assume you're willing to stand behind the
quality of your cows' milk. You wouldn't object
to a taste test, then?
<PAGE>
When you've gotten some quality <BLUE>milk</BLUE> from your
cows, bring it to my mansion, just as you did
with your vegetable.
<PAGE>
I will drink the milk you bring and pit its flavor
against my refined palate. That should put the
question to rest, don't you agree?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Excellent. Then that's just what we shall do. I
await your finest milk. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was in the neighborhood today and decided to
pay a visit to view your cows. Consider it my
second inspection.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you waiting for? Show me to your
barn.
